Package de.ntcomputer.minecraft.controllablemobs.api.ai.behaviors

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIAttackMelee
    Attack behavior: An AI behavior that lets an entity attack its target with a melee attack.
    AIAttackRanged
    Attack behavior: An AI behavior that lets an entity attack its target with a ranged attack, based on the entity class.
    AIBehavior<E extends LivingEntity>
    The base class for AI behaviors.
    AIFleeSun
    An AIBehavior that will force the entity to move out of the sun.
    AIFloat
    Very important AIBehavior that lets the entity swim.
    AILookAtEntity
    The entity will look at another entity when the distance between them is not too long.
    AIMoving<E extends LivingEntity>
    Abstract class which defines an AI behavior that requires the entity to move.
    AIRandomLookaround
    If this behavior is added, the entity will curiously look around when it is idle.
    AIRandomStroll
    If this behavior is added, the entity will curiously move around when it is idle.
    AIRestrictSun
    An AIBehavior that will force the entity to stay out of the sun.
    AITargetBehavior<E extends LivingEntity>
    Base class for target behaviors
    AITargetBehaviorEx
    Base class for target behavior with extended arguments.
    AITargetHurtBy
    Target behavior: When the entity is being attacked, it will attack its attacker back.
    AITargetNearest
    Target behavior: If this AIBehavior is added, the entity will search in its surroundings for an attackable target.
